title: Bedroom
text: You are in your bedroom. You see a door leading to the hallway.

descriptions.bed: The bed is neatly made. You can look under it.
descriptions.under bed: You find a lot of dust and a key.
descriptions.key: A small rusty key lies under the bed.

title: Hallway
text: You are in the hallway. There is a locked door to the north and a mat on the floor.

descriptions.mat: You lift the mat and find a key underneath.

title: Locked Room
text: You have unlocked the door and entered the room. There is nothing here.
